diagnosis.final_diagnosis: anaphylaxis after administration of ibritumomab tiuxetan
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient developed chest tightness, shallow respirations, hypotension, and incontinence immediately after receiving a therapeutic dose of Y-90 ibritumomab tiuxetan. His clinical presentation met the criteria for anaphylaxis, and an elevated human antimouse antibody (HAMA) level was found, indicating an immunologic response.
